room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Chris gave us a great experience. We enjoyed the room, me and my coleagues have done multiple escape rooms and Chris made it a fun experience throughout the room making it very interactive and exciting!

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: That was a lot of fun! I went here with my work colleagues and we competed to complete rooms. It was challenging and enjoyable at the same time. Great experience and I think I will bring my family back to either this location or the one in the Woodlands.

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: We tried the new room and it was really really cool, a shout out to James!

room_title: Escape room "Meltdown" by Escape the Room Texas in Houston
review: Nuclear room was awesome! Currently holding the #1 time. James the clue master was great!
